snippet.title: Trigger Knight (Kongregate Flash Game) 100% Playthrough, All Achievements
snippet.description:
Guide the Knight to defeat as many enemies as she can before her life ends! Gather gold via combats, and direct her to stronger equipment, healing items, and divine deathblow techniques to defeat deadly dragons, in multiple rapid split-second decisions! Let's play Trigger Knight by Mintsphere!————— 
👉 How to Play This Game for FREE!

1. Download and install the Flashpoint Infinity emulator from https://bluemaxima.org/flashpoint/
2. Use the emulator's built-in library to search for the game you want to play.
3. Click download and wait for the game to load. And that's it!

👉 If you found this helpful, please SUBSCRIBE to my channel! Help me reach 1,000 subscribers for some extra special surprises!
